message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CYBER, cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.CE 

The paper introduces a mobile app that utilizes machine learning algorithms to predict relapse and recommend addiction diversion activities. This suggests a focus on human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and cybersecurity (cs.CYBER) in terms of user privacy and data security. The app also builds a community for users to share experiences and seek advice, which falls under social and information networks (cs.SI). Natural language processing (cs.CL) may also be involved in analyzing user interactions within the community. Finally, the app's use of spatial and temporal factors suggests a potential application in computer vision (cs.CV) or computer engineering (cs.CE) for location tracking and data analysis.
